Key Match Events: Devon Conway hit 92 off 58 balls, anchoring New Zealand's innings.
Finn Allen scored 42 off 16 balls, putting Australia on the back foot early.
Tim Southee took 3 wickets for New Zealand, conceding 6 runs in 2.1 overs.
Mitchell Santner and Ish Sodhi restricted Australia's middle order, taking 3 and 1 wickets respectively.
Pat Cummins was dismissed for 21 off 18 balls, ending with a strike rate of 116.66.
Post-Match Reflections: Devon Conway said, 'Special performance from the boys. Credit has to go to Finn [Allen], he gave the momentum for us.'
Tim David has performed well enough to warrant a place in the New Zealand XI according to Anil Kumble.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand last beat Australia in Australia in December 2011.
Glenn Phillips made a crucial catch to dismiss Marcus Stoinis.
